casebody.data:
Smith, Appellant, v. Pelott, Respondent. (Supreme Court, General Term, Third Department. March 15, 1892.) Action by James M. Smith, as executor of John Giles, deceased, against Frank Pelott.

Argued before Mayham, P. J., and Putnam and Herrick, JJ.

Ho opinion. Motion for reargument of appeal from order granted. For decision on appeal, see 15 N. Y. Supp. 972, mem. See, also, 16 N. Y. Supp. 631; 18 N. Y. Supp. 301.
